Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/95th
ShortDescription: 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 103rd, Western, 95th & Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, 103rd, Western, 95th, then resume their normal route on Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/95th.

Allow extra travel time.
